text: Olivier Martinez (born 12 January 1966) is a French actor. His role in Un, deux, trois, soleil (1993), earned him a CÃ©sar Award for "Most Promising Actor". He also appeared in Before Night Falls (2000), the erotic thriller Unfaithful (2002) and S.W.A.T.
